PipelineInspectionSumField.name: PipelineInspectionSumField
PipelineInspectionSumField.description: Use this object to learn which field from the opportunity object is used to aggregate Pipeline Inspection metrics on a pipeline view.

SobjectType.description: The object that stores the summary fields.

SummaryField.description: The field used to summarize Pipeline Inspection metrics. Possible values are standard field names or custom field IDs for custom currency and number fields.
